title: The Casual Promos
body: Just yknow, the very consistent AFK's in ranked. Yet Riot does nothing. gj riot 3v5 to end a winstreak

replies.body:
i really do think the system knows somehow when people will AFK, or forces people to DC....

i got to 99 LP the other day on a smurf, was getting 25-35 LP per win and then 1 game i only get 14 for some reason....and it put me on 99.
the game must have thought i was meant to be in promos, cos next game i got 3 AFKs on my team and 1 on the enemy team....2 vs 4....and i still won.
then in promos it hit again, 2 straight games with 2 and 1 AFK respectively. sadly i lost those because i played like a derp forgetting to position correctly.

How is this Rito's fault?

Tell me.

Did they just suddenly make them disconnect?
That really sucks man, but don't let it get you down.
